text: Johannes Kert (3 December 1959 – 4 March 2021) was an Estonian politician and military officer. He was the Commander of the Estonian Defence Forces from 1996 until 2000. He retired from the military in 2008. Kert had been a member of the Estonian Reform Party. Kert died on 4 March 2021 at the age of 61.Suri endine kaitseväe juhataja Johannes Kert ==References== Category:1959 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Estonian politicians Category:Generals
title: Johannes Kert
